channel.title: Searching for team members (Upcoming big server)
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qHLcCpf.png[/img][/CENTER]
Mistex is returning to the rsps world under new management, and we are excited to give you a much more improved version of the game. I come to you here on behalf of our team in order to recruit a few members to take part in our journey. The server is set to release next Friday between the times of 2 and 3 pm eastern. We are currently looking for one to two developers, a graphics artist, and one or two moderators to manage the game during the release. We expect to have a huge release this friday. Unfortunately we will be pretty picky when picking our staff because honestly they are major contributors to a successful server.
[IMG]http://puu.sh/pwmoF/2ca00914de.png[/img] 3 days after being released.
[IMG]http://puu.sh/pwmrZ/b2005f7bb7.png[/img]
Updated image [img]http://puu.sh/pwIij/7b0d95b9cd.png[/img]
Solid activity prior to the release.
[U]Postions Available[/U]
[ul][*]Website/Seciurity developer [*]Server/Client Developer [*]Forum Moderator [*]Two server supports[/ul]
[U]Requirements[/U]
[ul][*]Skype [*]Must speak fluent english (Multilinguist are always appriciated) [*]Be able to dedicate a few hours a day to your specfic role [*]Provide sufficint proof of your prior experience [*]Open Minded [*]Friendly and open to constructive criticism[/ul]
I look forward to speaking with you guys. Feel free to message me your Skype or visit our forums at [url=http://mistexps.org/com/]http://mistexps.org/com/[/url].

item.title: Searching for team members (Upcoming big server)
item.dc:creator: @Keldagrim Keldagrim
item.description:
@Keldagrim wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

Mistex is returning to the rsps world under new management, and we are excited to give you a much more improved version of the game. I come to you here on behalf of our team in order to recruit a few members to take part in our journey. The server is set to release next Friday between the times of 2 and 3 pm eastern. We are currently looking for one to two developers, a graphics artist, and one or two moderators to manage the game during the release. We expect to have a huge release this friday. Unfortunately we will be pretty picky when picking our staff because honestly they are major contributors to a successful server.


3 days after being released.

I look forward to speaking with you guys. Feel free to message me your Skype or visit our forums at http://mistexps.org/com/.
